text: The Hotel National, Moscow () is a five-star hotel in Moscow, Russia. It opened in 1903. It has 202 bedrooms and 56 suites. The National is on Manege Square. The hotel is managed by The Luxury Collection, a division of Marriott International. Category:20th-century establishments in Russia Category:1903 establishments in Europe Category:Hotels Category:Buildings and structures in Moscow
title: Hotel National, Moscow
